channel.title: Crowbar Impact Sound Fix
channel.description:
With this small script change the crowbar will make the swing sound combined with hitting objects/surfaces, just like HL2's crowbar.
Download [url='https://www.mediafire.com/file/5fvdbptm73zm37w/CrowbarImpactFix.rar']here.[/url] Video Demo [url='https://youtu.be/ac6j0Y6C2Ug']here[/url] ![](upload://zW272JGbsXLNVgE7jl8x7Y023gZ.jpeg) note: Backup your Black Mesa directory before installing mods/fixes to revert changes later Install: extract to Steam folder.

item.description:

item.title: Crowbar Impact Sound Fix
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
It’s not a sound, it’s a script Basically a bug fix that will be fixed in the upcoming patch anyway, if they have noticed it.

Awesome nonetheless though

I think I’m going to make a compilation of mods and fixes for my second playthrough, when Xen is released, which will include this if it isn’t in the patch.

Read full topic

item.title: Crowbar Impact Sound Fix
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
I know they normally don’t add or change sounds, but I hope they make an exception for this…

Read full topic

item.title: Crowbar Impact Sound Fix
item.dc:creator: BendyBread
item.description:
Thanks for the confirmation.

Working like a charm. Such a simple change, but I really really do enjoy it. I never thought about it until this was posted, so I went around smacking things before I inserted the file, and it just sounded weird with no swing sond.
Thanks for the great contribution.

Read full topic

item.title: Crowbar Impact Sound Fix
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
yeah you’re extracting it into your steam folder, it’ll overwrite the already existing .txt file in the black mesa folder

Read full topic

item.title: Crowbar Impact Sound Fix
item.dc:creator: BendyBread
item.description:
Wow, I never realised in BM it entirely removed the swing animation when hitting things.

I like this idea. I’ve downloaded it, but I’ll be honest - I’m stupid and have no idea how to use it.
I assume I take the file, follow the same ‘path’ as it is in it’s own folder except using my steam folders, and then put the file in?

Read full topic

item.title: Crowbar Impact Sound Fix
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
With this small script change the crowbar will make the swing sound combined with hitting objects/surfaces, just like HL2’s crowbar.

Download here.
Video Demo here

note: Backup your Black Mesa directory before installing mods/fixes to revert changes later
Install: extract to Steam folder.
